channel.title: pandemic on Rolling Roland - Bicycling to Work in Vancouver
channel.description: Recent content in pandemic on Rolling Roland - Bicycling to Work in Vancouver

item.title: Unless you're physically distancing, please bicycle in a straight line
item.description: Pandemic or not, we need to bicycle in a predictable fashion so everybody sees us and we are predictable. No swerving! I know it feels good but leave that for wide AAA bicycle paths not the city of Vancouver streets.
